column1: Family will receive friends Tuesday 6-9pm & Wed. 2-4 & 6-9pm at the Copeland Moon Twp. Funeral Home
column2: 981 Brodhead Road where prayers will be offered Thursday at 9:15am followed by a 10am Mass of Christian Burial in St. Margaret Mary Church with Father Frank Kurimsky Officiating. Interment will follow in Hopewell Hebron Cemetery.
